snippet: It was the first sign that Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan was willing to engage in a direct dialogue with the leaders of the protest.
abstract: Turkey’s Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan agrees to meet with leaders of protest movement whose opposition to razing of park in Istanbul’s Taksim Square was a catalyst for violent nationwide antigovernment demonstrations that have escalated into political crisis; it is first sign that Erdogan is willing to engage in direct dialogue with protesters.
lead_paragraph: It was the first sign that Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan was willing to engage in a direct dialogue with the leaders of the protest.

headline.seo: Turkish Leader Agrees to Meet Protest Organizers
headline.main: Turkish Leader Agrees to Meet Protest Organizers
headline.print_headline: Turkish Leader Agrees to Meet Protest Organizers
